DataElement.preferredName: Duke Psychosocial Questionnaire How Motivated to Exercise 30 Minutes per Day for 5 Days a Week Over Next 24 Weeks Score 7 Point Visual Analogue Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's observation of how motivated they are to exercise 30 minutes a day for 5 days over the next 24 weeks, using a 7 point visual analogue scale.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A scale for the subjective scoring of an individual's motivation that ranges from 1: Not at all motivated to 7: Extremely motivated.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective score of 7 on a motivation scale that ranges from 1: Not at all motivated to 7: Extremely motivated.

Concepts.definition: A subjective score of 7 on a motivation scale that ranges from 1: Not at all motivated to 7: Extremely motivated.

ReferenceDocuments.name: On a scale from 1 to 7, where
ReferenceDocuments.description: On a scale from 1 to 7, where 1 means not at all motivated and 7 means extremely motivated, how motivated are you that you to exercise 30 minutes a day at least 5 days a week over the next 24 weeks?
